what is the age of maturity for this dog
when does this dog become an adult
how long does it take for this dog to become independent
what is the growth rate of this dog
when does this dog start breeding
how long does it take for this dog to reach full size
responses: The maturity period for dogs varies by breed, but most dogs reach sexual maturity between 6 months to 2 years of age, and full maturity around 1-2 years. Larger breeds tend to take longer to mature.

patterns: how many cubs does a lion have
how many babies can a lion have
what is the average number of cubs for a lion

how many cubs do lions typically have

how often do lions give birth to cubs
responses: A lioness typically gives birth to 1 to 4 cubs, but litters of up to 6 cubs have been reported. The average litter size is around 2 to 3 cubs.

responses: An elephant typically gives birth to 1 calf, although twins can occur in rare cases. The average interval between births is about 4 to 5 years.
